home.title: Os

animated.fourth: Di Wan we mek di Kɔntinɛnt .

home.footer: Wɛbsayt naw translet & avaliable insay 100+ langwej dɛn!
home.descriptionA: Ekspiriɛns ful-stak softwea injinia & wɛb divɛlɔpa wit wan demonstret istri fɔ saksesful lida divɛlɔpmɛnt prɔjek dɛm, frɔm fɔ mek Java modifyeshɔn fɔ Minecraft to ɛnhans yuza ɛkspiriɛns in react.js ɛn implimɛnt sikyuɔr REST API dɛm, we kɔnsistɛntli employ Agil mɛtodɔlɔji ɛn ifɛktiv tim kolaboreshɔn.
home.descriptionB: Apat frɔm dat, a na wan jiografi kɔntinyu krieta we dɔn saksesful wan leva di algɔritm dɛn fɔ bɔku soshal midia pletfɔm dɛn, inklud Instagram, YouTube, ɛn Tiktok, fɔ gɛt wan rɛspɛktful ɛn ɛngayjmɛnt fɔlɔ bays.

personal_summary.title: Pɔsin in Sɔma SƆMARI .
personal_summary.text: As wan ɛkspiriɛns ful stak softwea divɛlɔpa we de na Ɔlandɔ, FL, a dɔn sho ɛkspɛriɛns pan difrɛn teknɔlɔji dɛn, frɔm Java ɛn C++ to React.js ɛn Node.js. Wit wan trak rekod fɔ di spiahɛdin prɔjek dɛm, inklud di divɛlɔpmɛnt fɔ wan Java modifyeshɔn program fɔ Minecraft ɛn wan wɛbsayt we de briŋ bɛnifit fɔ trak drayva dɛm, a dɔn sho lidaship ɛn inovashɔn. Mi kɔmitmɛnt fɔ ɛksɛlɛns de klia wan insay mi abiliti fɔ strimlayn prɔjek manejmɛnt, sɔlv kɔmpleks prɔblɛm dɛn, ɛn deliv ay-kwaliti sɔlvishɔn dɛn we de ɛp yuza ɛkspiriɛns ɛn drɛb ɔganayzeshɔnal sakrifays.

entries.title: Ful Stak Injiniarin .
entries.text: I ofa komprehensiv solushun kross tu front-end en bak-end divelopment, ensuring seamless intagreshɔn en functionaliti truutout di entire softwa stak.

entries.title: Wɛb Divɛlɔpmɛnt .
entries.text: Wit ɛkspɛriɛns pan HTML, CSS, ɛn JavaSkript fɔm dɛn lɛk React.js, I de kraft visually apil ɛn yuz-frenli wɛbsayt dɛn we dɛn tayl fɔ mit di klaynt dɛn spɛshal nid ɛn prɛferɛns.

entries.title: Divεlכpmεnt fɔ Gem .
entries.text: Levayj langwej dɛm lɛk Java ɛn C++, a spɛshal fɔ mek imɛrsiv gem ɛkspiriɛns, frɔm kɔnsɛpt ɛn dizayn to implimɛnt ɛn ɔptimayzeshɔn, fɔ mek shɔ se dɛn de ple gem ɛn smol pefɔmɛns.

biblioteca.title: Biblioteca JSON
biblioteca.text: Wan Paytɔn projɛkt we de mek langwej transleshɔn izi. Alaw fɔ mek dɛn translet mi wɛbsayt pɔtfolio insay 70+ langwej dɛn, we inklud Spanish, Frɛnch, Chaynish, Arabik, ɛn bɔku ɔda wan dɛn. Dɛn kin yuz dis prɔjek fɔ mek wan wɛbsayt pɔtfolio we de tɔk bɔku langwej dɛn, we rili yusful fɔ rich to bɔku pipul dɛn. Wit dis projɛkt, ɔva 99% pan di wɔl kin rid mi pɔtfolio insay wan fayn fayn langwej.

connect_four.title: Konekt fo .
connect_four.text: Massive famili of ova 50+ implimentishons of di Connect fo gem. Dis projɛkt inklud implimɛnt dɛm na ɔva 30 difrɛn programin langwej dɛm, we inklud Java, C++, Paytɔn, JavaSkript, ɛn mɔ. Apat frɔm dat, i inklud bak ɔva 20+ difrɛn fremwɔk ɔ ɔda fɔmat dɛn, we inklud react.js, ruby ​​on rails, ASP.NET, ɛn mɔ.

grocery_app.title: Di ap fɔ di grosɛri .
grocery_app.text: Wan kɔmplit ful-stack .NET 9 Blazor sava aplikeshɔn fɔ manej grosa tin dɛn. Di aplikeshɔn de fala di kɔntrol/savis/ripɔsitɔri patɛn wit ɛntiti fremwɔk kɔr fɔ pɔsitiv ɛn inklud wan kɔmprɛhɛnsif tɛst suit.

interop.title: Interop projɛkt .
interop.text: Wan projɛkt we de dɔkyumɛnt inta-ɔparabiliti bitwin difrɛn programin langwej dɛn. Naw, i gɛt 15 difrɛn programin langwej dɛn ɛn 18 ɛgzikishɔn patɛn.

inventory_register.title: Invɛntari Rɛjista .
inventory_register.text: Wan ful-stack demo point fɔ sɛl (POS) rɛjista wit invɛntari manejmɛnt sistem we dɛn bil wit Angular 17+ ɛn Node.js. Dis aplikeshɔn de sho wan pɔshɔnal-grɛd POS sistem wit yuz ɔthɛntishɔn, rol-bɛs akses kɔntrol, invɛntari trakin, ɛn mɔk pemɛnt prɔsesin.

formatter.title: JSON & YAML AUTO FORMATER
formatter.text: Wan Linter & AutoFormatter fɔ JSON & YAML fayl dɛn. Dis projɛkt de fɔ fɔmat JSON & YAML fayl dɛn, we rili yusful fɔ kip kɔd klin ɛn ɔganayz. Bil wit Go, kompil wit WebAssembly, en embed in mi portfolio as a websait projek. Mɔ fɔmat dɛn fɔ kam insay di fyuchu.

minecraft_json_generator.title: Minecraft JSON jenɛratɔ .
minecraft_json_generator.text: Laytwɛt JSON jenɛra we dɛn bil insay Paytɔn fɔ Minecraft Rishɔs & Data Pak. Dɛn kin yuz dis prɔjek fɔ mek JSON fayl dɛn fɔ Minecraft Mods, we gɛt kɔstɔm tin dɛn, blɔk dɛn, ɛn ɛntiti dɛn. Very yusful fɔ nɔ jɔs mek kɔstɔm datapak, bɔt fɔ mods as wɛl via di mod nem switching ficha.

educational_experience.title: Mi Edukeshɔn Ɛkspiriɛns .
educational_experience.text: Alongside mi pesonal projek dem, a don get plenti skils tu from edukeshonal expiriens. Klik ya fɔ si mi LinkedIn prɔfayl fɔ mɔ infɔmeshɔn.

professional_experience.title: Mi Prɔfɛshɔnal Ɛkspiriɛns .
professional_experience.text: Alongsaid mi pesonal projek dem, a don get plenti skils tu from profeshonal expiriens. Klik ya fɔ si mi LinkedIn prɔfayl fɔ mɔ infɔmeshɔn.

portfolio_website.title: Patrick Goodwin portfolio wɛbsayt .
portfolio_website.text: Dis wɛbsayt na mi pasɔnal pɔtfolio wɛbsayt, we dɛn bil wit react.js. Dis projɛkt de fɔ sho mi skil ɛn prɔjek dɛm, ɛn bak fɔ gi wan ples fɔ di wan dɛn we go want fɔ tek mi fɔ wok fɔ kɔntakt mi. Dɛn kin yuz dis prɔjek fɔ mek pɔsin we sabi du in wok na di Intanɛt.

lua_library.title: Patrick in Lua skript laybri .
lua_library.text: Wan yusful laybri fɔ LUA skript fɔ fiuja rɛfrɛns. Dis laybri de fɔ ɔtomayz wok dɛn na Lua skript, we kin kam fayn fɔ wok dɛn we pɔsin fɔ du fɔ pefɔmɛns-nɛdi, bikɔs LUA kin bi fasta skriptin langwej pas ɔl tu Paytɔn ɛn Rubi.

excel_scripts.title: Patrick in Microsoft Excel sprɛdshit skript dɛn (VBA) .
excel_scripts.text: Wan yusful laybri fɔ VBA skript fɔ Microsoft Excel. Dis laybri de fɔ ɔtomayz wok dɛn na Excel sprɛdshit dɛn.

neovim_config.title: Patrick in Neovim Kɔnfig .
neovim_config.text: Mi pasɔnal neovim kɔnfigyushɔn. Dis projɛkt de fɔ kɔnfigyut Neovim to mi lɛk, inklud kɔstɔm kibayndin, tim, ɛn plɔgin. Dis projɛkt de fɔ mek Neovim mɔ yuz-frenli ɛn efishɔnal fɔ mi pasɔnal yuz.

python_maps.title: Patrick in map jenɛratɔ .
python_maps.text: Wan Yunaytɛd Stet Kaonti & Stet Map jenɛra, we dɛn bil wit Paytɔn yuz di Jiopandas ɛn Matplotlib laybri dɛm. Dɛn kin yuz dis prɔjek fɔ mek map dɛn na Amɛrika, we gɛt kɔntri ɛn stet map dɛn. Dis projɛkt de fɔ mek kɔstɔm map fɔ data vijualizɛshɔn ɛn analisis.

powershell_library.title: Patrick in PowerShell skript laybri .
powershell_library.text: Wan yusful laybri fɔ PowerShell skript fɔ fiuja rɛfrɛns. Yusful wit di $profile skript ficha, a fain dis immensely helpful fo automating task dem from di Windows terminal, as a bi wan frekwent yuza fo di Windows OS.

ruby_library.title: Patrick in Ruby Skript Laybri .
ruby_library.text: Wan yusful laybri fɔ ruby ​​skript fɔ fiuja rɛfrɛns. Yusful fɔ fiuja Rubi pan rel divɛlɔpmɛnt kɔnsɛpt dɛn.

pdf_builder.title: PDF skills bilda .
pdf_builder.text: Wan kɔstɔm PDF bilda we dɛn bil wit Paytɔn bay di PDFKIT ɛn Jinja2 ɛkstenshɔn dɛn, nia HTML ɛn JSON fɔmat. Dɛn kin yuz dis prɔjek fɔ mek PDF fayl dɛn frɔm wan list we gɛt skil ɛn prɔjek dɛn. Dis projɛkt kin yuz fɔ mek wan kɔstɔm PDF rizyum, we rili yusful fɔ wok aplikeshɔn.

rijandel_encryption.title: Rijandel ɛnkripshɔn Projɛkt .
rijandel_encryption.text: Wan famili we gɛt 10+ implimɛnt dɛn fɔ di Rijandel ɛnkripshɔn algɔrithm insay 128, 192, ɛn 256 bit dɛn. Dis projɛkt de fɔ sho di Rijandel ɛnkripshɔn algɔrithm insay difrɛn programin langwej dɛn. Dis projɛkt de fɔ mek wan famili fɔ implimɛnt dɛn fɔ di Rijandel ɛnkripshɔn algɔrithm.

suprememc.title: SupremeMc Minecraft mod .
suprememc.text: Wan Minecraft mod we de ad kɔstɔm tul dɛn, armor, mobs, blɔk, dimɛnshɔn, ɛn bɔku ɔda tin dɛn to di gem. Dɛn bil am wit Java vɛshɔn 8-17 fɔ sɛlɛkɛt Minecraft vɛshɔn dɛn bitwin 1.16 ɛn 1.20.

tiger_programming_language.title: Tiger programin langwej .
tiger_programming_language.text: Kastom programin langwej we dɛn bil insay ɔl tu Go & Rust fɔ ɛkspiriɛns wit intaprita dizayn ɛn pefɔmɛns. Impliment na di portfolio wɛbsayt yuz Wɛb Asɛmbli.

tiger_tailgating_pros.title: Tiger Tailgating Pros wɛbsayt .
tiger_tailgating_pros.text: Wan wɛbsayt we a bil insay 2024 fɔ Tiger Tailgating Pros, wan tailgating kɔmni na Clemson, SC. Dɛn bil am wit react.js.

turing_machine.title: Turing mashin projɛkt .
turing_machine.text: Famili we gɛt pas 30+ implimɛnt dɛn fɔ di Turing mashin. Yuz fɔ sho Turing kɔmplitnɛs fɔ difrɛn programin langwej dɛn fɔ risach, mɔ fɔ di Tiger programin langwej.

contact.title: Kontakt mi .
contact.description: A de ansa kwɛstyɔn dɛn frɔm imel, LinkedIn mɛsej dɛn, ɛn Instagram mɛsej dɛn. A go kol bak tu if mi nomba de provaid via resume o oda we, no mata se a prefer fo kip mi fon nomba prayvet.

formatter.title: JSON & YAML fɔmat
formatter.description: Di JSON & YAML Formatter na wan tul we de alaw yu fɔ fɔmat JSON ɛn YAML fayl dɛn. Dɛn bil am wit Go ɛn Webassembly, ɛn dɛn mek am fɔ fast ɛn efishɔnal. Di fɔmat na fɔ mek i izi fɔ yuz, wit wan simpul intafays we de alaw yu fɔ pas insay yu JSON ɔ YAML kɔd ɛn fɔmat am wit di klik fɔ wan bɔtin.
formatter.more_info1: Fɔ no mɔ, luk na di README we de na di

tiger.title: Tiger Langwej .
tiger.description: Di Tiger programin langwej na kɔstɔm programin langwej we dɛn bil insay ɔl tu di GO & RUST fɔ ɛkspiriɛns wit intaprita dizayn ɛn pefɔmɛns. Impliment na di portfolio wɛbsayt yuz Wɛb Asɛmbli. Di Tiger programin langwej na kɔstɔm programin langwej we dɛn bil insay ɔl tu di GO & RUST fɔ ɛkspiriɛns wit intaprita dizayn ɛn pefɔmɛns. Impliment na di portfolio wɛbsayt yuz Wɛb Asɛmbli.
tiger.more_info1: Fɔ no mɔ, luk na di README we de na di

tab.title: Patrick Goodwin .
tab.description: Ful Stak Softwea Injinia we de na Sɛntral Flɔrida .

languages.title: Pɔtfɔlio transletɔ .
languages.description: Diskova aw mi portfolio na aksesbul fɔ visitɔ dɛn frɔm ɔlsay na di wɔl wit sɔpɔt fɔ pas 100 langwej dɛn.

global_accessibility.title: Globɛl Aksessibiliti .
global_accessibility.description: Mi portfolio de in ova {count} langwej, mek am aksesbul to visitors frɔm ɔlsay na di wɔl. Dis we fɔ tɔk bɔku langwej dɛn de sho mi kɔmitmɛnt fɔ inkluziviti ɛn glob ɔl rich insay sɔftwɛl divɛlɔpmɛnt.

stats.countries_represented: Di kɔntri dɛn we dɛn ripresent .

items.title: Rial-taym transleshɔn:
items.description: Switch langwej dɛn wantɛm wantɛm wit di langwej sɛlɛktɔ .

items.title: Langwej we de na di URL:
items.description: Dɛn kip di langwej we dɛn lɛk na di URL .

items.title: Nativ skript sɔpɔt:
items.description: di rayt we fɔ rɛnd skript dɛn lɛk Arabik, Chaynish, Hindi, ɛn ɔda wan dɛn

items.title: Di sɛnsitiviti fɔ di kɔlchɔ:
items.description: Transleshɔn dɛn kin tink bɔt kɔlchɔ kɔntɛks, nɔto jɔs literal minin dɛn .

items.title: SEO we dɛn dɔn ɔptimayz:
items.description: Ɛni langwej variant na ɔptimayz fɔ sɔch injin dɛn .

world_map.title: Intaraktiv Wɔl Map .
world_map.description: Hova oba kɔntri dɛn na di map fɔ si dɛn langwej dɛn we dɛn sɔpɔt:

supported_languages.title: Langwej dɛn we dɛn de sɔpɔt .

interactive_country_map.title: Interaktiv kɔntri map .
interactive_country_map.description: Hova ova kɔntri dɛm we de dɔŋ fɔ si dɛn sɔpɔt langwej dɛm:
